thread.section_title: Amalfi Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: small, friendly hotel
thread.title_full: small, friendly hotel - Review of Amalfi Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: cnewman9
title: small, friendly hotel
text:
A small hotel with friendly and helpful staff. We had a small room but it was adequate. Everything very clean. The dining area is quite small so you may have to wait for a table at breakfast, but the lady who looks after the dining room is very friendly and helpful. The breakfast is both hot and cold. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who wants a value for money stay in Rome. The location is ideal in my view.
Room Tip: Quieter rooms at the rear. See more room tips
